DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Investigational Lubricant Eye Drop Lipid Layer Thickness
DOC.criteria: Patients ( minimum age 18 ) meeting specific criterion dry eye . Use topical ocular drop within 12 hour study visit ; use topical ocular ointment within 36 hour study visit . In addition , use topical ocular drug study period . History evidence ocular systemic medical condition and/or medication would confound evaluation .
